hero.headline: We Design
hero.description: Webique is a creative digital agency that transforms businesses with design and marketing solutions tailored for impact.

aboutSection.title: About Webique
aboutSection.description: At Webique, we craft high-end websites, brands, and marketing experiences for businesses that want to stand out. With a focus on design, technology, and storytelling, we build digital identities that leave a lasting impact.

servicesSection.title: We Offer
servicesSection.description: Our expert team delivers a full suite of services that elevate your brand — from stunning websites and branding to growth-focused marketing and deep analytics.

workSection.title: Our Work
workSection.description: We’ve proudly collaborated with over 50 businesses across the Middle East, creating impactful digital experiences that elevate their brand and reach.

contactSection.title: Let's Connect
contactSection.description: Have a project in mind? Let’s make it happen. Our team is ready to bring your vision to life with design, strategy, and innovation.

aboutPage.storyText: Webique was born from the shared passion of three international students studying abroad in the UK. We were driven by a deep desire to build something that empowers people — not just websites, but opportunities, dreams, and brands that matter. We started small, with just our laptops and vision, and today we help clients across the region make their ideas a reality.
aboutPage.ctaText: Ready to elevate your brand with us?

founders.yosuf: CTO · From Egypt · Studying Computer Science
founders.founder2: Creative Director · From Saudi Arabia · Studying Digital Media
founders.founder3: Marketing Lead · From Jordan · Studying Business & Marketing

servicesPage.title: Our Services
servicesPage.subtitle: We offer full-service packages to build your online presence — from stunning websites to smart content strategies.

website.title: Website Packages
website.basicDesc: A professionally built website and domain registration, perfect for those who want to establish an online presence quickly without ongoing updates. Fast setup, simple and clean, no maintenance included.
website.standardDesc: Includes everything from the Basic plan plus continued support and changes — whether small edits or complete redesigns. Great for businesses that evolve over time.
website.premiumDesc: Our most complete website solution. Includes domain, continuous support, custom email setup, and full-stack development — for startups, e-commerce, or custom applications.

social.title: Social Media Packages
social.basicDesc: A collection of professional posts and stories delivered as a ready-to-use pack. Best for seasonal campaigns or a quick boost. No scheduling or monthly management included.
social.standardDesc: Ongoing account management including weekly posts and stories. We handle design, planning, and scheduling, tailored to your brand voice and calendar.
social.ondemandDesc: Get custom-designed posts and stories whenever you need them — no limits, no fixed plan. Perfect for influencers, campaigns, or fast-paced brands.

contactPage.title: Let's Connect
contactPage.description: Have a project in mind? Let’s make it happen. Our team is ready to bring your vision to life with design, strategy, and innovation.

workPage.title: Our Work
workPage.description: We’ve proudly collaborated with over 50 businesses across the Middle East, creating impactful digital experiences that elevate their brand and reach.
workPage.socialDescription: Beyond websites, we help brands grow on social platforms through strategic content, consistent design, and audience engagement.
